Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 77th overall pick, by Washington in 2009...
Released by Washington on 9/1/2010...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 9/1/2010 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/20/2011 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/5/2012 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2013, off Johan Santana (LAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/2013, off Dustin McGowan (LAN)...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2013, hitting .282 with 36 HR, 107 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against New York (N), driving in 4 runs on 4/18/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/2014, hitting .520 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2014, hitting .381 with 10 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/6/2014...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (A), driving in 8 runs on 6/8/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/2014, hitting .583 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2014, hitting .380 with 11 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2014, hitting .306 with 52 HR, 139 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Drove in 9 runs against Washington on 10/2/2015...
Injured on 7/10/2016 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 7/22/2016...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2017, hitting .364 with 7 HR, 29 RBI...
Drove in 8 runs against San Diego on 5/14/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/21/2018, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Traded from Colorado to Baltimore on 5/30/2020 (Going to COL: P J. Kelly, CF C. Curtis, C B. Loranger. Going to BAL: 3B R. Pena, 3B M. Horta)...
Drove in 7 runs against Boston on 9/2/2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 4/9/2021...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 4/26/2021...
Hit 4 homeruns against Boston, driving in 4 runs on 6/28/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Seattle on 8/3/2021...
